Content: A student has been severely injured in Nuwaraeliya after colliding with a lorry while heading home from school. The student who studies at a school in Kotagala has been riding a motorcycle without a valid driverâ€™s license. The motorcycle that was heading in a high speed has first crashed with a car and thereafter collided with the lorry. The accident has taken place around 2.30 pm today and the injured student has been admitted to Dickoya hospital. The lorry driver has been arrested by Dimbula police that conduct further investigations into the incident.
